
for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    a=raw_input().split()
    x=a[0]
    y=a[1]
    for j in xrange(len(x)):
        if x[j]!='0':
            break
    for j1 in xrange(len(y)):
        if y[j1]!='0':
            break
    x=x[j:]
    y=y[j1:]
    x=x[::-1]
    y=y[::-1]
    s=str(int(x)+int(y))
    s=s[::-1]
    for jj in xrange(len(s)):
        if s[jj]!='0':
            break
    s=s[jj:]
    print s
